meanings.definition: Pennycresses: a plant of the mustard family with small white flowers
meanings.sent1: In the garden, the pennycresses added a touch of beauty with their delicate white flowers.
meanings.sent2: Farmers grow pennycresses for their lovely white blooms.
meanings.sent3: The pennycresses in the field were gossiping about the daisies next door.
meanings.sent4: The pennycresses stood out like tiny clouds against the green backdrop of the garden.
meanings.sent5: Children loved picking pennycresses and pretending they were fairy hats.

meanings.definition: Pennycresses: the seeds of the pennycress plant, used for oil production
meanings.sent1: The farmer harvested the pennycresses to extract oil for cooking.
meanings.sent2: The market was bustling with buyers looking for high-quality pennycresses for oil extraction.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole the bag of pennycresses and tried to sell them as magic beans.
meanings.sent4: The pennycresses held the promise of golden oil within their tiny shells.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly pressed pennycress oil filled the kitchen with a delightful scent.
